function_v0.doc:
Pause the contract (emergency stop)

When paused, all user-facing functions are disabled except admin functions.
This is an emergency mechanism to protect user funds in case of discovered vulnerabilities.

# Errors
* `NotAdmin` - If caller is not the admin
function_v0.name: pause

function_v0.doc: Check if a contract is an approved game
function_v0.name: is_game

function_v0.doc:
Unpause the contract

Restores normal contract functionality after emergency pause.

# Errors
* `NotAdmin` - If caller is not the admin
function_v0.name: unpause

function_v0.doc:
Update the contract WASM hash (upgrade contract)

# Errors
* `NotAdmin` - If caller is not the admin
function_v0.name: upgrade

function_v0.doc:
Add a game contract to the approved list

# Errors
* `NotAdmin` - If caller is not the admin
function_v0.name: add_game

function_v0.doc:
End a game session with outcome verification

Requires game contract authorization. Both players' FP wagers are spent/burned.
Only the winner's wager contributes to their faction standings.
ZK proof verification handled client-side for MVP.

# Errors
* `SessionNotFound` - If session doesn't exist
* `InvalidSessionState` - If session is not Pending
* `InvalidGameOutcome` - If outcome data doesn't match session
* `ProofVerificationFailed` - If ZK proof is invalid
function_v0.name: end_game

function_v0.doc: Get the admin address
function_v0.name: get_admin

function_v0.doc:
Get epoch information

Returns current epoch if no number specified, otherwise the specified epoch.

# Errors
* `EpochNotFinalized` - If requested epoch doesn't exist
function_v0.name: get_epoch

function_v0.doc: Check if contract is paused
function_v0.name: is_paused

function_v0.doc:
Update the admin address

# Errors
* `NotAdmin` - If caller is not the current admin
function_v0.name: set_admin

function_v0.doc: Get the current configuration
function_v0.name: get_config

function_v0.doc:
Get player information

Returns complete persistent player data including selected faction, total deposited,
and deposit timestamp.

# Errors
* `UserNotFound` - If user has never interacted with the contract
function_v0.name: get_player

function_v0.doc:
Start a new game session

Locks factions and fp for both players. If this is a player's first game
in the epoch, initializes their fp and locks their faction.

# Errors
* `GameNotWhitelisted` - If game_id is not approved
* `SessionAlreadyExists` - If session_id already exists
* `InvalidAmount` - If wagers are <= 0
* `InsufficientFactionPoints` - If players don't have enough fp
* `ContractPaused` - If contract is in emergency pause mode
function_v0.name: start_game

function_v0.doc:
Claim epoch winnings/yield for a user for a specific epoch

Calculates user's share of the reward pool based on their fp contribution
to the winning faction.

# Returns
Amount of USDC claimed

# Errors
* `EpochNotFinalized` - If epoch doesn't exist or isn't finalized
* `RewardAlreadyClaimed` - If user already claimed for this epoch
* `NotWinningFaction` - If user wasn't in the winning faction
* `NoRewardsAvailable` - If user has no rewards to claim
* `ContractPaused` - If contract is in emergency pause mode
function_v0.name: claim_yield

function_v0.doc:
Cycle to the next epoch

Finalizes current epoch (determines winner, withdraws BLND, swaps to USDC,
sets reward pool) and opens next epoch.

# Returns
The new epoch number

# Errors
* `EpochNotReady` - If not enough time has passed
* `EpochAlreadyFinalized` - If current epoch is already finalized
* `FeeVaultError` - If fee-vault operations fail
* `SwapError` - If BLND \xe2\x86\x92 USDC swap fails
function_v0.name: cycle_epoch

function_v0.doc:
Remove a game contract from the approved list

# Errors
* `NotAdmin` - If caller is not the admin
function_v0.name: remove_game

function_v0.doc:
Initialize the contract

Sets up the admin, external contract addresses, and creates the first epoch.

# Arguments
* `admin` - Admin address (can modify config and upgrade contract)
* `fee_vault` - fee-vault-v2 contract address
* `soroswap_router` - Soroswap router contract address
* `blnd_token` - BLND token address
* `usdc_token` - USDC token address
* `epoch_duration` - Duration of each epoch in seconds (default: 345,600 = 4 days)
* `reserve_token_ids` - Reserve token IDs for claiming BLND emissions (e.g., vec![&env, 1] for reserve 0 b-tokens)

# Errors
* `AlreadyInitialized` - If contract has already been initialized
function_v0.name: __constructor

function_v0.doc:
Update global configuration

Allows admin to update specific configuration parameters.
Only updates parameters that are provided (non-None).

# Arguments
* `new_fee_vault` - New fee-vault-v2 contract address (optional)
* `new_soroswap_router` - New Soroswap router contract address (optional)
* `new_blnd_token` - New BLND token address (optional)
* `new_usdc_token` - New USDC token address (optional)
* `new_epoch_duration` - New epoch duration in seconds (optional)
* `new_reserve_token_ids` - New reserve token IDs for claiming BLND emissions (optional)

# Errors
* `NotAdmin` - If caller is not the admin
function_v0.name: update_config

function_v0.doc:
Select a faction for the user

Sets the user's persistent faction preference. Can be changed at ANY time.
If you haven't played a game this epoch, the new faction applies immediately.
If you've already played this epoch, the current epoch stays locked to your
old faction, and the new selection applies starting next epoch.

# Arguments
* `faction` - Faction ID (0=WholeNoodle, 1=PointyStick, 2=SpecialRock)

# Errors
* `InvalidFaction` - If faction ID is not 0, 1, or 2
function_v0.name: select_faction

function_v0.doc:
Get the reward pool (USDC) for a finalized epoch

# Errors
* `EpochNotFinalized` - If epoch doesn't exist or isn't finalized
function_v0.name: get_reward_pool

function_v0.doc:
Get player's epoch-specific information

Returns complete epoch-specific data including locked faction, available/locked FP,
total FP contributed, and initial balance snapshot.

If the user exists but hasn't played this epoch yet, returns a valid EpochUser with:
- No faction locked (epoch_faction = None)
- Zero faction points (available_fp = 0, locked_fp = 0)
- No contributions (total_fp_contributed = 0)
- Initial balance of 0 (not yet snapshotted)

# Errors
* `UserNotFound` - If user has never interacted with the contract
function_v0.name: get_epoch_player

function_v0.doc: Check if a user's faction is locked for the current epoch\n\nOnce locked (after first game), faction cannot be changed until next epoch.
function_v0.name: is_faction_locked

function_v0.doc:
Get the winning faction for a finalized epoch

# Errors
* `EpochNotFinalized` - If epoch doesn't exist or isn't finalized
function_v0.name: get_winning_faction

function_v0.doc: Check if user has claimed rewards for an epoch
function_v0.name: has_claimed_rewards

function_v0.doc:
Calculate how much a user would receive if they claimed now

This doesn't actually claim, just calculates the amount.
Useful for UIs to show pending rewards.

# Returns
Amount user would receive, or 0 if not eligible
function_v0.name: get_claimable_amount

function_v0.doc:
Get faction standings for a specific epoch

Returns a map of faction ID to total faction points.

# Errors
* `EpochNotFinalized` - If epoch doesn't exist
function_v0.name: get_faction_standings

udt_struct_v0.doc:
Persistent user data (across all epochs)

Stores the user's faction preference and deposit information.
This persists across epoch boundaries.
udt_struct_v0.name: User

fields.doc: Timestamp when the user first deposited (or last reset via >50% withdrawal)
fields.name: deposit_timestamp

fields.doc: User's vault balance from the previous epoch (for cross-epoch comparison)\nUsed to detect >50% withdrawal between epochs
fields.name: last_epoch_balance

fields.doc: The user's persistent faction selection (can be changed between epochs)
fields.name: selected_faction

udt_struct_v0.doc:
Global configuration

Stores contract configuration parameters.
Note: Admin address is stored separately via DataKey::Admin for single source of truth.
Note: Pause state is stored separately via DataKey::Paused for efficient access.
udt_struct_v0.name: Config

fields.doc: BLND token address
fields.name: blnd_token

fields.doc: Duration of each epoch in seconds (default: 4 days = 345,600 seconds)
fields.name: epoch_duration

fields.doc: fee-vault-v2 contract address
fields.name: fee_vault

fields.doc:
Reserve token IDs for claiming BLND emissions from Blend pool
Formula: reserve_index * 2 + token_type
token_type: 0 = debt token, 1 = b-token (suppliers)
Example: For reserve 0 b-tokens (suppliers), use [1]
fields.name: reserve_token_ids

fields.doc: Soroswap router contract address
fields.name: soroswap_router

fields.doc: USDC token address
fields.name: usdc_token

udt_struct_v0.doc: Epoch metadata\n\nStores all information about an epoch including timing, standings, and rewards.
udt_struct_v0.name: EpochInfo

fields.doc: Unix timestamp when this epoch ends (start_time + epoch_duration)
fields.name: end_time

fields.doc: The sequential epoch number (starts at 0)
fields.name: epoch_number

fields.doc: Map of faction_id -> total fp contributed by all players\nUsed to determine the winning faction
fields.name: faction_standings

fields.doc: True if epoch has been finalized via cycle_epoch
fields.name: is_finalized

fields.doc: Total USDC available for reward distribution (set during cycle_epoch)
fields.name: reward_pool

fields.doc: Unix timestamp when this epoch started
fields.name: start_time

fields.doc: The winning faction (None until epoch is finalized)
fields.name: winning_faction

udt_struct_v0.doc:
Per-epoch user data

Created when a user first interacts with the contract in a new epoch.
Tracks faction points and epoch-specific faction lock.
FP is calculated once at first game of epoch based on vault balance.
udt_struct_v0.name: EpochUser

fields.doc: Available faction points (not locked in games)\nCalculated once at first game of epoch and remains valid until next epoch
fields.name: available_fp

fields.doc: The faction locked in for this epoch (locked on first game)\nNone = not yet locked, Some(faction_id) = locked
fields.name: epoch_faction

fields.doc: User's vault balance snapshot at first game of this epoch\nUsed to save the balance this epoch's FP was calculated from
fields.name: initial_balance

fields.doc: Faction points currently locked in active games
fields.name: locked_fp

fields.doc: Total faction points contributed to the user's faction this epoch\nUsed for reward distribution calculation
fields.name: total_fp_contributed

void_v0.doc: Game has started but not yet completed
void_v0.name: Pending

void_v0.doc: Game has completed with a verified outcome
void_v0.name: Completed

udt_struct_v0.doc:
Game outcome for verification

This is the data structure that should be proven by the ZK proof.
The proof verifies that these values are correct based on game execution.
udt_struct_v0.name: GameOutcome

fields.doc: Game contract address
fields.name: game_id

fields.doc: First player's address
fields.name: player1

fields.doc: Second player's address
fields.name: player2

fields.doc: Unique session identifier
fields.name: session_id

fields.doc: Winner of the game\ntrue = player1 won, false = player2 won
fields.name: winner

udt_struct_v0.doc:
Game session tracking

Created when a game starts, updated when it ends.
Tracks all game state including players, wagers, and outcome.
udt_struct_v0.name: GameSession

fields.doc: Timestamp when game was created
fields.name: created_at

fields.doc: Address of the game contract
fields.name: game_id

fields.doc: First player's address
fields.name: player1

fields.doc: Faction points wagered by player1
fields.name: player1_wager

fields.doc: Second player's address
fields.name: player2

fields.doc: Faction points wagered by player2
fields.name: player2_wager

fields.doc: Unique session identifier for this game instance
fields.name: session_id

fields.doc: Current status of the game
fields.name: status

fields.doc: Winner of the game (None until completed)\ntrue = player1 won, false = player2 won
fields.name: winner

udt_error_enum_v0.doc:
Error codes for the Blendizzard contract

All errors are represented as u32 values for efficient storage and transmission.
Error codes are grouped by category for better organization.
udt_error_enum_v0.name: Error

cases.doc: Caller is not the admin
cases.name: NotAdmin

cases.doc: Contract has already been initialized
cases.name: AlreadyInitialized

cases.doc: User has insufficient balance for the requested operation
cases.name: InsufficientBalance

cases.doc: User has insufficient faction points for the requested wager
cases.name: InsufficientFactionPoints

cases.doc: Amount is invalid (e.g., zero or negative)
cases.name: InvalidAmount

cases.doc: Faction ID is invalid (must be 0, 1, or 2)
cases.name: InvalidFaction

cases.doc: User's faction is already locked for this epoch (cannot change)
cases.name: FactionAlreadyLocked

cases.doc: User does not exist (no deposits or interactions yet)
cases.name: UserNotFound

cases.doc: Game contract is not in the whitelist
cases.name: GameNotWhitelisted

cases.doc: Game session was not found
cases.name: SessionNotFound

cases.doc: Game session with this ID already exists
cases.name: SessionAlreadyExists

cases.doc: Game session is in an invalid state for this operation
cases.name: InvalidSessionState

cases.doc: Game outcome data is invalid
cases.name: InvalidGameOutcome

cases.doc: Proof verification failed (ZK proof is invalid)
cases.name: ProofVerificationFailed

cases.doc: Epoch has not been finalized yet
cases.name: EpochNotFinalized

cases.doc: Epoch has already been finalized
cases.name: EpochAlreadyFinalized

cases.doc: Epoch cannot be cycled yet (not enough time has passed)
cases.name: EpochNotReady

cases.doc: No rewards available for this user in this epoch
cases.name: NoRewardsAvailable

cases.doc: Reward has already been claimed for this epoch
cases.name: RewardAlreadyClaimed

cases.doc: User was not in the winning faction for this epoch
cases.name: NotWinningFaction

cases.doc: fee-vault-v2 operation failed
cases.name: FeeVaultError

cases.doc: Soroswap swap operation failed
cases.name: SwapError

cases.doc: Token transfer operation failed
cases.name: TokenTransferError

cases.doc: Arithmetic overflow occurred
cases.name: OverflowError

cases.doc: Division by zero attempted
cases.name: DivisionByZero

cases.doc: Contract is paused (emergency stop activated)
cases.name: ContractPaused

tuple_v0.doc: User epoch-specific data - EpochUser(epoch_number, user_address) -> EpochUser
tuple_v0.name: EpochUser

tuple_v0.doc: Reward claim tracking - Claimed(user_address, epoch_number) -> bool
tuple_v0.name: Claimed
